content:
Here are 20 types of accommodations that parents might search for when deciding which hotel or resort to select:

1. Hotels
2. Resorts
3. All-inclusive resorts
4. Vacation rentals (e.g. apartments, houses, condos)
5. Beachfront properties
6. Ski resorts
7. Luxury hotels
8. Budget hotels
9. Boutique hotels
10. Family-friendly hotels
11. Pet-friendly hotels
12. Hotels with pools
13. Hotels with spas
14. Hotels with fitness centers
15. Hotels with restaurants
16. Hotels with free breakfast
17. Hotels with free parking
18. Hotels with shuttle service
19. Hotels with kids' clubs
20. Hotels with babysitting services

It's worth noting that the specific accommodations that parents might be interested in can vary based on their preferences and the needs of their family. To attract families as customers, it can be helpful to highlight any amenities and services that are specifically geared towards families, such as kids' clubs, babysitting services, and family-friendly activities.
